title: @Riot, Game crashes after champ selelct
body: This game is getting on my damn nerves after playing it for 4 years and having no clue as to why my game just started recently crashing. I would submit a support ticket but it takes 2 weeks to get a response to an e-mail. I tried to do some fixes that I searched on google and none of them work. I also tried the frequent problems list but that didn't help either. I uninstalled, restarted my computer reinstalled. Still doesnt work. I tried to have the client repair itself and it doesnt work. Can someone help me fix this shit before I go insane please.

replies.body: Did you do the Windows 10 Anniversary Update ? And do you have an NVIDIA GeForce graphics card?
Yes. Do you have the solution? There is one update that it is not allowing me to uninstall.
I have both nvidia card and newest update to windows 10. I do not have a solution. Do you know how to fix this?

Check out the response up there that I put, sorry I'm pretty new to the forums so idk if I was supposed to type this as a "reply" to you guys to get an alert message or if you guys still got it just as another part of the thread. Once again, good luck ! Drove me bananas all weekend and yesterday lol.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/NAXe6XfY-i-may-have-figured-out-the-crashing-problem-guys

Try this, I made this thread yesterday when I got League to work for me. Good luck ! :)
Also, sorry for not getting back to you guys sooner !
No worries, my friend ! Here to help other LoLers out haha :)

I'd really like to help you out, but I need more information on what exactly is happening.  What do you mean by crash?  Are there any error messages?  What are you seeing exactly and when?  Let me know, and I can try to help!
Its already been fixed. But after champ select I would get bug splat. As soon as the loading screen was about to pop up I would get bug splat
